## Severity

<!-- Select one severity level by replacing [ ] with [x] -->

- [ ] **Critical** - Blocks core functionality (registration, portfolio generation)
- [ ] **High** - Major feature doesn't work but workaround exists
- [ ] **Medium** - Minor feature doesn't work correctly
- [ ] **Low** - Cosmetic issues, typos, minor UX issues
